tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Doctor's communication with patients relatives was excellent..explained every aspect of preventive dentistry related to my child..Ambience is very much child friendly..waiting time also minimum..Thank you Dr. Biswaroop Chandra for your immense  help to solve our problem..

tags: Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: Doctor is very friendly my son loves to visit him ,and also he is recovering his problem will surely recomend others Thanks a lot

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
Dr.Bishwaroop Chandra is very brilliant doctor!
I have a 10 yrs old son whose milk teeth are not falling naturally but new teeth are coming out over those milk teeth!
He examined very carefully,made a plan and started executing immediately!The way he handled my son was just amazing !My son couldn’t get a chance to cry but he managed to extract two of his dangling teeth!My son had around 5 visits and by then half of his problems are gone!
On the other hand my father has been suffering from severe toothache.He visited many doctors but of no use! They  said nothing can be done and finally I took him to dr.Chandra!He found out infected areas with the help the of x-ray plate and drilled the tooth cap and started treating my father.After few days I got a call from my father and he was saying  that his pain has gone completely!I can’t stop crying seeing the relief in my father’s voice !
Dr.is intelligent,young ,dynamic and highly skilled !

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: The doctor is great with the children.... I have never come across such amazing patience from doctors with children... I think this is the only perfect dental clinic for children in Kolkata... Always a reference for anyone who is searching a dental doctor for their child...

tags: Value for money,
review: Doctor is good but charging very very high price. For one tooth extraction they are charging straight 4000. Simple filling charge 1800. Extraction doctor was not good in my case. He took 45 minutes for two extractions and used drills cutters etc. Extract the teeth into pieces after trying lots of effort.

tags: Explanation of the health issue,
review: Although it was our first time visit as we took our 5.5 years old son for d cavities problem,, everything from d entry till completion of our work was taken best care of... I was much tensed for wd d x-ray d to be done as immediate was gap filling,, but d way doctor took care of each n everything n d way he engaged n encouraged my child is praiseworthy ..we hv to mk more visits n I trust that we ll continue having d same experience... We really appreciate.... Wishing him all d best for more n more smiles to come thru him!!!!

tags: Value for money,
review:
Too much costly and just for tooth picking it took 1500 which is too much.
Otherwise it is clean and tidy

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: My experience was wonderful. The cause and solution to the problem was explained well, and it was very reassuring.

tags: None
review:
This was my first visit to the dentist and I was pleasantly surprised by how extremely nice and effective the procedure was. The doctor was kind enough to explain what the issue was and what the next course of action should be. I was surprised by how easy it was to approach the doctor and how easy going he was about the entire procedure. 
I would definitely recommend him and would continue to get my dental issues addressed by him. 
P.S. The staff were extremely nice.
reply_text: Thank you so much for your feedback. We look forward to serve you in the future.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review:
What I felt is that he knows how handle little children. My 5 years old daughter was scared of dentist, but after 1st visit, she came out of the chamber and said 'ma, ei dentist uncle khub valo' . 
And what I felt odd is, on 2nd visit for her dental filling, within 3 4 working days, i had to pay doctor's visit again along with treatment cost. That is something I am not much used to.
But if someone ask for recommendations, i will recommend Dr. Biswaroop Chandra blindly
reply_text: Thank you mam for your generous feedback. Happy to help.
